title: Getting Started with Zion AI Marketplace
body: Welcome to Zion! Learn how to create an account, set up your profile, and explore the marketplace.

title: How do I hire?
body: To hire, post a job from your dashboard, review proposals, and select your preferred talent. See pricing and contracts in the job flow.

title: How do I get matched?
body: Tell us your project details and timeline. Our system recommends pre-vetted talent that match your requirements.

title: Billing Help
body: Manage payment methods in Settings â†’ Billing. Invoices are issued monthly. For refunds or disputes, contact support.

title: Can't log in? Troubleshooting Guide
body: If you can't log in: 1) Reset your password. 2) Check email spam for verification. 3) Ensure correct 2FA code/time sync. 4) If locked out, contact support.

title: Profile Setup
body: Complete your profile with bio, skills, and verified identity for higher visibility.

title: Disputes: How to resolve issues
body: Open a dispute from the contract page within 14 days of delivery. Our team mediates and aims for a fair resolution.
